name: John McCain
summary: War hero and U.S. Senator who was Trump's most prominent Republican critic until his death in 2018. Delivered the decisive vote against repealing Obamacare and requested Trump not attend his funeral.

keyStatements.quote: He's not a war hero. He was a war hero because he was captured. I like people who weren't captured.
We are not the president's subordinates. We are his equals.
Our relationship has been one of fair and unfair criticism, me of Mr. Trump. But at some point, I thought the presidency would show more respect for the office than he does for himself.

timeline.significance: Tortured for 5.5 years as prisoner of war

timeline.event: Withdrew support for Trump after Access Hollywood tape
timeline.significance: Said he'd write in another candidate

timeline.event: Cast decisive vote against Obamacare repeal
timeline.significance: Thumbs down vote blocked Trump's priority

credibility.background: War hero, POW for 5.5 years in Vietnam, U.S. Senator for 31 years, 2008 Republican presidential nominee

oppositionReasons: Trump attacked McCain's military service and POW status
Trump showed no respect for the presidency
endorsement: Did not support Trump; requested Trump not attend his funeral
